name: Space Cat Simulator
description:
An extremely realistic cat-themed ballistics simulator where you play as a cat that got lost on the international space station on its way to eat a Bostonian rat on a launch bay.

And the cat also has super powers?

And the AI is an underpayed intern??

And the doctor has a shitty german accent???

And the spider has a tophat????

And where one person does all the voice acting??!?!??!?!?!??!?

POORLY????????????!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
